name: stupefying
content:
stupefying adjective
(TIRING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
making someone unable to think clearly, usually because they are extremely tired or bored, or have taken drugs: stupefying heat/noise He was sedated by the stupefying drug Lorazepam.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was suffering from a stupefying headache.Driving under the influence of stupefying substances is illegal.The film induces stupefying boredom with little payoff in the end.

stupefying adjective
(SURPRISING)
